input_text:
Job Title: Cycle Counter (Full Time)

Location: Gilroy, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Why Work for UNFI?

As one of the largest grocery wholesalers and retailers in the United States, UNFI is dedicated to feeding our communities by providing innovative, customer-centric solutions. We deliver on that promise every day through a strong network of 30, 000 talented employees who supply the best national brands and our own high-quality and affordable private label products to thousands of customers, and millions of consumers, nationwide. With a wide variety of services and industry leading expertise, UNFI offer you the opportunity to shape the food industry through every stage of your career.

Our Distribution Center in Gilroy, CA is immediately hiring for an Inventory Control â€“ Cycle Counter. This person will report directly to the Inventory Control Manager and will work with other inventory control personnel. This position will spend most of their time on the floor with some office work included.

Job Responsibilities and Accountabilities:

Working with general supervision, provides basic administrative services in support of warehouse environment, with 20% of work for researching inventory related problems.Candidate is dependable, willing to work overtime, and able to work every Sunday.Maintains an established schedule of cycle counts to audit inventory records and actual product on hand.Enters inventory adjustments into the computer-based inventory control system and generates nightly reports.Performs other administrative or office duties as assigned.

Job Requirements:

Interested candidates must be flexible with their work schedules and meet the following requirements:Some recent clerical experience needed.Experience working with computer-based inventory management system would be beneficial.Knowledge of OMI inventory control system.Basic inventory control and/or warehouse operations knowledge.Ability to perform detail work and detect discrepancies on documents.Basic computer data entry skills are required,Must be able to lift 40+ lbs.

The above statements are intended to describe the general nature of the work performed by the employees assigned to this job. All employees must comply with Company policy and applicable laws. The responsibilities, duties and skills required of personnel so classified may vary within each department and/or location.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Enters inventory adjustments into the computer-based inventory control system
Performs other administrative or office duties as assigned

Basic inventory control and/or warehouse operations knowledge. Ability to perform detail work and detect discrepancies on documents. Basic computer data entry skills are required. Must be able to lift 40+ lbs.
